head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths HRONES, JOHN A. OF JAFFREY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths HRONES, JOHN A. OF JAFFREY

block.p: HRONES-John A. Of Jaffrey, NH and Sarasota, Fla, formerly of Cleveland, OH and Wellesley, Ma. on June 15th. Beloved husband of the late Margaret (Baylis), devoted father of Janet Roach of Waldron Island, WA., Stephen of Concord, MA., Mary Parsons of Ann Arbor, MI, and John Jr. of Needham, MA. A Memorial Service August 12th, First Church, Jaffrey, NH. Memorial Donation to the John Hrones MIT Fund for Needy City of Boston Students, MIT, 77 Mass Ave, Cambridge, Mass 02139
